Design Project
Mediterraneo emotional hotel & spa
The Mediterraneo Emotional Hotel & SPA occupies the premises of a marvellous 19th century palace in the heart of Santa Margherita Ligure, just a few feet from the sea.

Recently remodelled according to an architectonic project aimed at the conservative restoration of the historical parts and the recovery of the existing decorative elements, it owes its own originality to the elegance of the marble and artisanal cement tiles, the warmth of wood and the green of the spacious, meticulously maintained garden.

Atlas Concorde has contributed to the d√©cor of the spaces, by supplying marble effect porcelain tiles for the floors and walls of all bathrooms. A maximum expression of the technical and aesthetic excellence of the hotel itself, the ceramic tiles convey a meticulous graphic effect in every detail: intense veining and natural gradations reproduce with extreme realism the distinctive characteristics of the original material, transforming itself into indispensable details of style.

The marble effect porcelain tiles used moreover guarantee optimal technical characteristics in terms of resistance to wear, staining and contact with detergents, thus creating a decor capable not only of responding to superior aesthetic requirements, but to the need for top-quality technical performance as well.

Where
Santa Margherita Ligure, Italy
Project by
Architetto Elena Capurro
